alert.note: Alert for Northern Liberty (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 05 at 6:22PM CDT by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Liberty County through 645 PM CDT... At 621 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Hardin, or 11 miles west of Saratoga, moving west at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Daisetta, Hardin, Kenefick, Dayton Lakes, Moss Hill and Tarkington Prairie. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
